Package controller

Class Kontrolleri

java.lang.Object
controller.Kontrolleri
All Implemented Interfaces:
IKontrolleriForM, IKontrolleriForV
public class Kontrolleri extends Object implements IKontrolleriForM, IKontrolleriForV

The controller class for the simulation.

Works by connecting the model, @see simu.model.OmaMoottori, and the view, @see view.SimulaattorinGUI.
